content.text: Jessica is Andy's girlfriend from season 8. She is very beautiful and seemingly rich. She enjoys running. Andy said that his parents loved her and gave him the old family ring, minus the center stone, to propose to her with. Andy ends up leaving her for Erin. She is an assistant cross-country coach at Bryn Mawr. Erin says that she wishes that Jessica was dead and buried in a graveyard under the ground with worms coming out of her mouth to Andy in Christmas Wishes.

images.caption: Erin talking to Andy with Jessica at the Christmas party.
Andy breaks up with Jessica at her bachelorette party by telling her that he's gay.
